title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Ethnicity, and Population in thousands in each Ethnicity on the y axis.
Chinese is higher than any other categories with value 2969.28, followed by Malays, and Indians. Down to category Others with the lowest value of 128.65.
The highest value at Chinese is almost 23.08 times larger than the minimum value of Others.
